title: Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace
description: When using Ctrl+M (Add Import), nothing happens if there is trailing whitespace within the selected text.
OB: When selecting text and using Ctrl+M (Add Import), if there is trailing whitespace within the selection, nothing happens.
EB: When selecting text and using Ctrl+M (Add Import), if there is trailing whitespace within the selection, the Add Import feature should still work correctly.
SR: The Add Import feature should be updated to ignore leading/trailing whitespace when used with Ctrl+M.
